ygData.subject: Re: REST Workshop Slides Available
ygData.msgSnippet: I had to read your question three times before I got what you were asking, but, yes, I do. Using dashes, the sentence could be read like this: Clients-not

I had to read your question three times before I got what you were asking, =
but, yes, I do.

Using dashes, the sentence could be read like this:

Clien=
ts-not
servers-are
responsible for application state

Parens are much more =
clear:

Clients
(not servers)
are responsible for application state

 -Pete=
